channel.title: SunshineFM - Modern Media for Palm Springs Coachella
channel.description: AI-native modern media exploring how AI and the new economy are reshaping business, culture, and second-chapter life in the Coachella Valley and beyond.

item.title: AI Tooling Shifts from Intelligence to Orchestration—What Coachella Valley Operators Need to Know
item.description: The models are commoditizing. The real competitive advantage is moving to orchestration. Here's what local operators need to understand about building systems in 2026.

item.title: The Model Wars Are Over—Now What?
item.description: OpenAI, Google, and Anthropic are locked in a three-way battle. But for local operators in Coachella Valley, the real question isn't who wins—it's what you build while they fight.

item.title: AI Consolidation Begins
item.description: The AI ecosystem is consolidating faster than expected. What this means for startups, agencies, and operators in the Coachella Valley.

item.title: The Education Gap Widens
item.description: While AI tools become more accessible, the education gap grows. Local institutions need to move faster to prepare the next generation.

item.title: The AGI Distraction
item.description: Everyone's talking about AGI. But for businesses in Palm Springs Coachella, that's the wrong conversation to be having right now.

item.title: A Sonic Experiment
item.description: Testing the boundaries of AI-generated audio and what it means for modern media production in the desert.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: SunshineFM launches as an experiment in AI-native media for Palm Springs Coachella. Here's what we're building and why it matters.
